dict.acceptation: 检查员；（英国公共汽车或火车上的）查票员；（警察）巡官；检阅官；

sent.orig: Training inspector to make inspector understood the relative inspection technical knowledge and the acceptance standard.
sent.trans: 负责培训检验人员以便相关人员理解相关的检验技术和接受标准。

sent.orig: To check your weapons inspector settings, click the UN menu, and then click Weapons Inspector Options.
sent.trans: 检查你的武器核查专家的设置，点击UN菜单，然后点击“武器核查”选项。

sent.orig: That's one crazy chief inspector talking about another crazy chief inspector.
sent.trans: 这是一个疯探长谈论另一个疯探长。

sent.orig: The train stopped unaccountably; shortly afterward a ticket inspector began; the inspector's face was vaguely familiar.
sent.trans: 列车无故停驶，不一会儿又开始查起票来，查票人的脸有些眼熟。

sent.orig: It is reported that company is under investigation by the local inspector of taxes.
sent.trans: 据报道，这家公司正在受到当地税务稽查员的调查。
